summary: THE MOTORIZED EXTERIOR REAR VIEW MIRRORS MOVED TO AN INWARD POSITION BY THEMSELVES WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION, THIS RESULTED IN NO VISIBILITY, THE DEALERSHIP REPLACED THE MIRRORS BUT THE PROBLEM RECURRED.  *NLM   MIRRORS REPLACED AGAIN.  HEADLIGHTS FAILED.  MULTIFUNCTION SWITCH REPLACED.  PASSENGER SIDE WINDOW WON'T GO DOWN WHEN USING SWITCH.  *TT
